title: Trouble With Girls (Malibu, Eternity, Comico, Epic)
description:
The Ichthypod Express chugs ahead with 'Trouble With Girls'!

Wiki say:

The Trouble with Girls is an American comic book published serially from 1987Ã¢â‚¬â€œ1993 by Malibu Comics/Eternity Comics, Comico, and Epic Comics. It was written by Will Jacobs and Gerard Jones, and drawn by Tim Hamilton and others.

The Trouble with Girls is a satirical action series starring Lester Girls, who wants to be simply an "average guy" with a dead-end job, a plain wife, and no adventures more exciting than a good night's sleep. But Lester can't go for a drive without terrorists launching missiles at him, or walk into one of his many mansions without a beautiful, talented, curvaceous woman reposing half-dressed on his bed. Wealth, adventure, sexual magnetism, dashing good looks, and the savoir faire of a Hollywood action hero are what he calls "the curse of Girls."


In addition to the main series, there were spin-offs for a couple of supporting characters, Apache Dick and the Lizard Lady. The entire series was risque and ribald, with some of the minis being explicitly illustrated. Therefore, you must be at least six years old to download this torrent. (Ask your eight-year old brother if you need help.)

Contained within, you will find:

Apache Dick 1-4
Classic Girls 1-4
Heavy Hitters Annual 1
Lester Girls - The Lizard's Trail 1-3
Lizard Lady 1-4
Trouble With Girls - Christmas Special 
Trouble With Girls - Night of the Lizard 1-4
Trouble With Girls Annual 1
Trouble With Girls v1 1-14
Trouble With Girls v2 1-23

The bulk of this torrent was glommed two years ago from a TPB upload by brodahisu in 2009 (and still slightly alive). I've added Classic Girls 2-4, which I believe makes this a full representation of the Trouble With Girls canon. As always, plaudits to the creators and scanners!

Geddit, seedit!
